project_descr: The project provides immediate, short- and medium-term assistance to the Federal Government of Somalia (FGS) to facilitate state formation and federalism processes, as well as to emerging states to establish basic functional capacity.

outputs.output_descr: The Support to Emerging Federal States (StEFS) project addresses needs primarily at the emerging federal state level but also supports those federal government structures that critically facilitate new state formation and capacity building.
donor_name: United Nations Multi Partner Trust Fund for Somalia

outputs.output_descr: Supporting the Federal Government of Somalia, in addressing needs primarily at the emerging federal state level but also supporting those federal government structures that critically facilitate new state formation.

PIP (Activity 1-6): Set of initial activities to support the FGS to form IRAs. StEFS (Outputs 1-6): Addresses capacity development needs at the emerging FMS level and supports the FGS to facilitate new state formation and federalism processes.
donor_name: United Nations Multi Partner Trust Fund for Somalia

outputs.output_title: Support to the Federal State F
outputs.output_descr: This project provides initial support to the FGS to facilitate the formation of interim regional administrations as precursors to federal member states, with the participation of local authorities, traditional elders, civil society, women and youth.
